member.name: P:Catel.Fody.ExposeAttribute.PropertyName
member.summary: Gets the name of the property that should be automatically created.

member.name: P:Catel.Fody.ExposeAttribute.PropertyNameOnModel
member.summary:
Gets or sets the name of the property on the model. If the is not the same as the name of the property on the model, this can be used to map the properties.
By default, the value is the same as the .
In this example, the name of the property to map on the model is first_name, but it must be available as FirstName on the view model.
[Model] [Expose("FirstName", "first_name")] public Person Person { get; set; }

member.name: P:Catel.Fody.ExposeAttribute.IsReadOnly
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this property is read only.
member.value: true if this property is read only; otherwise, false.
